class.rdfs:comment: A ProductReturnPolicy provides information about product return policies associated with an [[Organization]] or [[Product]].
class.rdfs:label: ProductReturnPolicy

schema:productReturnDays.rdfs:comment: The productReturnDays property indicates the number of days (from purchase) within which relevant product return policy is applicable.
schema:productReturnDays.rdfs:label: productReturnDays

schema:productReturnLink.rdfs:comment: Indicates a Web page or service by URL, for product return.
schema:productReturnLink.rdfs:label: productReturnLink
